status_message: "A hedge fund wouldn't fire the star trader if he was a drug user or an alcoholic. It would have to get rid of half the staff if it did. A publishing house doesn't drop its biggest-selling writer because he or she keeps a bottle of vodka next to the computer. There would be far fewer books to read if it did. Media companies need stars more than stars need media companies. It's that simple."
link_name: Charlie Sheen Could Teach Wall Street a Lesson: Matthew Lynn
